mapper.select: SELECT WCD.id, WCD.username, WCD.phone, WCD.email, WCD.company, WCD.handle, WCD.demand, DATE_FORMAT(WCD.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS createTime FROM WEB_COMMIT_DEMAND WCD WCD.demand LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}), '%') ORDER BY WCD.CREATE_TIME DESC
